Package ru.nsu.aeliseev2.task112.model

Class CardHand

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.aeliseev2.task112.model.CardHand
public class CardHand extends Object
Represents a player's hand.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    CardHand()
    Creates an empty card hand.
    CardHand(CardPool pool, int count)
    Creates a new card hand taking card from a pool.
